dojg.description: A verb that indicates how much something costs or a duration of time.

examples.japanese: (ksa).この時計は十万円する・します。
(ksb).後一年したら大学を出る・出ます。
examples.english: In another year I'll graduate from college.

examples.japanese: (a).A:それはどのぐらいしましたか。 B:二十五万円ぐらいしました。
examples.english: A: About how much did it cost?  B: It cost about 250,000 yen.

examples.japanese: (b).もう少しすれば主人が帰ってまいります。
examples.english: In a short time my husband will be here.

dojg.writeup: ## When する4 is used to mean 'lapse of time', it can only be used in a subordinate clause, as in Key Sentence (B) and Ex. (b). Therefore, the following sentence in which する4 is used in the main clause is ungrammatical.
